Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "No. 23" appears on top right corner of the poster. Orientation:  Vertical.
Description: Text quotes German leaders and  professors about German actions in the war in one column, in contrast to accounts of  their actual deeds in the next column. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: German words and German deeds
